title: [FSX/P3D] simMarket: SIMBREEZE - ABU DHABI OMAA
description:
Haven't seen this amazing scenery here so I thought I'd add it. 

Run the installer, then click through until it prompts for an activation code, fill the field with random numbers (dont press next) then open the activator, click detect, click generate, then copy the string from the activator into the installer and install the program. 

Install hotfix, to the folder where you installed the scenery. (ex: if the installer installs it to C:MicrosoftFSX then do the same for the hotfix)


The crack is from FlamerFTW, I only included it here for the convenience. 
 
https://thepiratebay.org/user/FlamerFTW/



Enjoy, and PLEASE SEED!
